pageTitle: Itinerary for Wednesday, August 23, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Wednesday, August 23, 2017:

Montréal, Quebec

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Intergovernmental Task Force on Irregular Migration.

Queen Elizabeth Hotel, Rue Mansfield Room
900 Boulevard René-Lévesque West
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 1:30 p.m

3:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability with the Intergovernmental Task Force on Irregular Migration.

Queen Elizabeth Hotel, Avenue Van Horne Room
900 Boulevard René-Lévesque West
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 3:00 p.m

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with Haitian community leaders.

Queen Elizabeth Hotel, Rue Mansfield Room
900 Boulevard René-Lévesque West
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Photo opportunity only
  • Media should arrive no later than 4:00 p.m

7:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will attend the charity event, “12 Rounds d’Espoir pour les Princes,” and will deliver remarks.

La TOHU
2345 Rue Jarry East
Montréal, Quebec

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m
